title: keyring_configparser
description: A ConfigParser subclass that can read values stored with the keyring pypi package. Used to store secrets within configuration files without needing to store them as plain-text.

title: beersheets-draft-assistant
description: A fantasy football draft assistant using beersheets rankings from the /r/fantasyfootball sub-reddit.

title: mouse_movement
description: A simple game where the objective is to 'catch' the box by getting your cursor over it. The faster the box is caught the better the score.
